original_text: Now when Balaam saw that it pleased the Lord to bless Israel, he did not resort to divination as at other times, but turned his face toward the wilderness.
korean_text: 발람이 자기가 이스라엘을 축복하는 것을 여호와께서 선히 여기심을 보고 전과 같이 점술을 쓰지 아니하고 그의 낯을 광야로 향하여

sentences.original_text: that it pleased the Lord to bless Israel
he did not resort to divination as at other times
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 다른 때처럼 점술을 사용하지 않았다

sentences.original_text: but turned his face toward the wilderness
